topic: How to property test ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to property test ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Property Testing ETL Jobs using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to perform property-based testing on Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) jobs using the FastAPI framework and Python 3.12+. We'll leverage libraries like Pytest-12 and Hypothesis for generating test data and checking properties.
key_points: Install necessary packages: fastapi, pytest, pytest-12, hypothesis
Create a FastAPI application and define ETL job endpoints
Define property tests using Hypothesis to verify the correctness of your ETL jobs
Set up test fixtures for shared setup/teardown tasks
Integrate property tests with pytest using the @pytest.mark.property decorator
version_notes: This guide is compatible with Python 3.12+
Ensure to install packages suitable for your Python version (e.g., pytest-12)
caveats: Always ensure that test data covers all edge cases and expected input formats
Implementing proper unit tests is essential in addition to property tests
